Hello blank fragment Q1. Can I place order on call? A1. Sorry, we don’t accept orders on call. However you can call us on +91-8327087545 for any help related to placing order. Q2. How do I know my order is confirmed? A2. We will send you a order confirmation email once we receive your order. Q3. How do I cancel my order? A3. Please refer to our return and cancellation policy. Q4. How will be my orders delivered? A1. Orders are delivered directly by the FoodSpot Packaging Assist suppliers. Different items in an order could be fulfilled by different suppliers. We will share the contact details and amount payable for all deliveries via email and SMS. Q5. Is delivery free? A5. Yes. There are no delivery or handling charges. Q6. Why is my location is not serviceable? A6. We are currently live only in a few cities. We will be expanding soon. Q7. When I have to pay? A7. You will have to pay at the time of delivery as per the payment details we send to you via email. Q8. Can I buy the goods on credit? A8. Sorry, we don’t allow a credit on goods currently. Q9. Will I get an invoice? A9. Yes. You will get your invoice from our supplier at the time of delivery. Q10. How have you selected these products? A10. We have show products which have passed our quality tests and are best suited for delivery. We will keep updating our catalog with better products. Stay tuned!
